LanguageData.ATR_Make_ChemfuelFromChemCapsule.label: synthesize chemfuel from chemical capsules
LanguageData.ATR_Make_ChemfuelFromChemCapsule.descrip: Make a batch of chemfuel by refining the raw resources within chemical capsules.
LanguageData.ATR_Make_NeutroamineFromChemCapsule.desc: Make a batch of neutroamine by refining the raw resources within chemical capsules.
LanguageData.ATR_Make_NutritionBlockFromSolutionAndCa: stabilize nutrient solution with chemical capsules
Make a batch of stabilized nutrition blocks by refining nutrient solution with chemical capsules. This is a time-intensive task.
